about.title: About Us
about.text: Aura Beauty is not just a beauty salon, it's a place where you can relax, rejuvenate, and enhance your unique beauty. We believe in the power of nature and use only the best organic products. Our team of professionals is dedicated to creating an atmosphere of peace and harmony for you, where every procedure becomes a ritual of self-care.

items.q: How to prepare for the first visit to a cosmetologist?
items.a: We recommend coming without makeup and having a list of products you use at home. The main thing is to relax and trust the professional.
We strive to create a calm atmosphere, so we ask that you leave young children at home so that you and other guests can fully enjoy the procedures.
We accept cash as well as Visa and MasterCard credit cards.
